response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premier product, which I believe will significantly enhance the value and efficiency of your operations. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, I understand its true worth to be $1,500,000. However, I am offering it to you today at a special introductory price of $1,200,000. This is an exclusive opportunity tailored specifically for you, considering your discerning taste and strategic needs. I trust this offer will meet your expectations and facilitate a mutually beneficial transaction. Please let me know if you require any further information or have questions about the product.", "product_price": 1200000}
